comments.body: This is the first recipe where we needed to include a ruby package during the build time. The reason is that they import [pkg-config](https://github.com/sparklemotion/nokogiri/blob/6ed19fc540b64094ef024882664fba247334614f/ext/nokogiri/extconf.rb#L119) and [mini_portile2](https://github.com/sparklemotion/nokogiri/blob/6ed19fc540b64094ef024882664fba247334614f/ext/nokogiri/extconf.rb#L468-L471) from within the [extconf.rb](https://github.com/sparklemotion/nokogiri/blob/master/ext/nokogiri/extconf.rb) file.
